"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Income tax expense for the year ended <em data-td-invalid-detail=
"1" style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28,
2018</em> increased from the year ended <em data-td-invalid-detail=
"1" style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28,
2017,</em> primarily as a result the revaluation of deferred tax
assets and liabilities to the lower enacted U.S. corporate tax rate
of <em data-td-fact-id="30497312" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">21%</em> under the
recent Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. The revaluation of deferred tax
assets and liabilities resulted in income tax expense of
approximately <em data-td-fact-id="30497313" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$421,000</em>
recognized in consideration of the lower enacted rate. The tax
benefit realized for the year ended <em data-td-invalid-detail="1"
style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497314" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">29,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497315" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016</em> was primarily
due to the tax consequences of a change in the controlling interest
in U-Swirl and foreclosure upon the stock of U-Swirl. During FY
<em data-td-fact-id="30497316" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016</em> an income tax
benefit of approximately <em data-td-fact-id="30497317" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$2,149,000</em> was
recognized as a result of the company foreclosing upon the interest
in U-Swirl and recognizing deferred tax assets and loss carry
forwards that previously had full valuation allowances when RMCF
had less than an <em data-td-fact-id="30497318" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">80%</em> ownership
interest. Resulting from this foreclosure, the Company now
consolidates U-Swirl within the Company’s income tax returns.
U-Swirl and RMCF filed consolidated income tax returns beginning
with FY <em data-td-fact-id="30497319" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2017.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
For the year ended <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497320" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">29,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497321" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016</em> and prior
periods, the financial statements presented represent the
consolidated statements of <em data-td-fact-id="30497322" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">two</em> separate
consolidated groups for income tax purposes. RMCF has filed income
tax returns consolidating the results of Rocky Mountain Chocolate
Factory and its wholly owned subsidiary, ALY. SWRL has filed a
separate consolidated income tax return for the results of U-Swirl,
Inc. and its wholly owned subsidiary, U-Swirl. RMCF and SWRL have
filed separate income tax returns because RMCF owned only
<em data-td-fact-id="30497323" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">39%</em> of SWRL.
Beginning on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">March 1, 2016,</em> the
results of U-Swirl have been included in RMCF’s consolidated income
tax returns. This is a result of the foreclosure of RMCF on the
outstanding stock of U-Swirl in satisfaction of debt between RMCF
and SWRL.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The Company files income tax returns in the U.S. federal and
various state taxing jurisdictions. With few exceptions, the
Company is <em data-td-fact-id="30497324" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">no</em> longer subject
to U.S. federal and state tax examinations in its major tax
jurisdictions for periods before FY <em data-td-fact-id="30497325"
style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2013.</em> The
Company’s federal income tax returns have been examined for the
years ended <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2015</em>
and <em data-td-fact-id="30497326" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2014</em> and the
examination did <em data-td-fact-id="30497327" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> result in any
changes to the income tax returns filed for these years.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Realization of the Company's deferred tax assets is dependent upon
the Company generating sufficient taxable income, in the
appropriate tax jurisdictions, in future years to obtain benefit
from the reversal of net deductible temporary differences. The
amount of deferred tax assets considered realizable is subject to
adjustment in future periods if estimates of future taxable income
are changed. Management believes that, with the exception of the
deferred tax asset related to restructuring charges, it is more
likely than <em data-td-fact-id="30497328" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> that RMCF will
realize the benefits of its deferred tax assets as of
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28,
2018.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The Company accounts for uncertainty in income taxes by recognizing
the tax benefit from an uncertain tax position only if it is more
likely than <em data-td-fact-id="30497329" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> that the tax
position will be sustained on examination by the taxing
authorities, based on the technical merits of the position. The
Company measures the tax benefits recognized in the consolidated
financial statements from such a position based on the largest
benefit that has a greater than <em data-td-fact-id="30497330"
style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">50%</em>
likelihood of being realized upon ultimate resolution. The
application of income tax law is inherently complex. As such, the
Company is required to make judgments regarding income tax
exposures. Interpretations of and guidance surrounding income tax
law and regulations change over time and
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">may</em> result in
changes to the Company's judgments which can materially affect
amounts recognized in the balance sheets and statements of
operations. The result of the assessment of the Company's tax
positions did <em data-td-fact-id="30497331" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> have an impact
on the consolidated financial statements for the years ended
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2018</em>
or <em data-td-fact-id="30497332" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2017.</em> The Company
does <em data-td-fact-id="30497333" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> have any
significant unrecognized tax benefits and does <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497334" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> anticipate a
significant increase or decrease in unrecognized tax benefits
within the next <em data-td-fact-id="30497335" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">twelve</em> months.
Amounts are recognized for income tax related interest and
penalties as a component of general and administrative expense in
the statement of income and are immaterial for years ended
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2018</em>
and <em data-td-fact-id="30497336" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2017.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<div data-thunderdome-xbrl-exclude="1" id="PGBK" style=
"width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
<div id="PGNUM" style=
"text-align: center; width: 100%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
48</div>
<hr style=
"PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; border: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000" />

<div id="PGHDR" style="text-align: left; width: 100%"><a href=
"#toc">Table of Contents</a></div>
</div>
<p style=
"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
As of <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497337" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">29,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497338" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016,</em> the Company
foreclosed on the outstanding equity of U-Swirl and U-Swirl was
consolidated for income tax purposes. SWRL, along with U-Swirl has
historically filed its own consolidated federal income tax return
and reported its own Federal net operating loss carry forward. As
of <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2015,</em>
SWRL had recorded a full valuation allowance related to the
realization of its deferred income tax assets. As of
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497339" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">29,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497340" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016,</em> a portion of
the U-Swirl deferred tax assets were recognized as a result of it
becoming more likely than <em data-td-fact-id="30497341" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> that some of
these assets would be realized in the future as a result of RMCF
and U-Swirl filing a consolidated income tax return.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
In accordance with Section <em data-td-fact-id="30497342" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">382</em> of the
Internal Revenue Code, deductibility of SWRL’s and U-Swirl’s
Federal net operating loss carryovers <em data-td-invalid-detail=
"1" style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">may</em> be
subject to annual limitation in the event of a change in control.
The Company has performed a preliminary evaluation as to whether a
change in control has taken place, and have concluded that there
was a change of control with respect to the net operating losses of
U-Swirl when the Company acquired its controlling ownership
interest in <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">January 2013</em> and
again in <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 2016</em> when
the Company foreclosed on the stock of U-Swirl. The initial
limitations will continue to limit deductibility of SWRL’s and
U-Swirl’s net operating loss carryovers, but the annual loss
limitation will be deductible to RMCF and U-Swirl International
Inc. upon the filing of joint tax returns in FY
<em data-td-fact-id="30497343" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2017</em> and future
years.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The Company estimates that the potential future tax deductions of
U-Swirl’s Federal net operating losses, limited by section
<em data-td-fact-id="30497344" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">382,</em> to be
approximately <em data-td-fact-id="30497345" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$1,050,000</em> with a
resulting deferred tax asset of approximately <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497346" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$258,173.</em> U-Swirl’
s Federal net operating loss carryovers will expire at various
dates beginning in <em data-td-fact-id="30497347" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2026.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">
&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div contenteditable="false" docsect="9" id="18018" sectdesc=
"Note to Financial Statements">&nbsp;</div>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-statement-type="note"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553145302" id="thunderdome-statement-883875">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">
NOTE <em data-td-fact-id="30497348" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">7</em> – STOCKHOLDERS’
EQUITY</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Cash Dividend</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The Company paid a quarterly cash dividend of <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497349" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$0.12</em> per share of
per share of common stock on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">March 10, 2017</em> to
stockholders of record on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 24, 2017.</em>
The Company paid a quarterly cash dividend of <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497350" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$0.12</em> per share of
common stock on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">June 16, 2017</em> to
stockholders of record on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">June 6, 2017.</em> The
Company paid a quarterly cash dividend of <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497351" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$0.12</em> per share of
common stock on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">September 15, 2017</em>
to stockholders of record on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">September 5, 2017.</em>
The Company paid a quarterly cash dividend of <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497352" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$0.12</em> per share of
common stock on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">December 8, 2017</em>
to stockholders of record on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">November 24, 2017.</em>
The Company declared a quarterly cash dividend of
<em data-td-fact-id="30497353" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$0.12</em> per share of
common stock on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 15, 2018,</em>
which was paid on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">March 16, 2018</em> to
stockholders of record on <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">March 6, 2018.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Future declarations of dividends will depend on, among other
things, the Company's results of operations, financial condition,
capital requirements, and on such other factors as the Company's
Board of Directors <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">may</em> in its
discretion consider relevant and in the best long-term interest of
the Company’s stockholders.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Stock Repurchases</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
On <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">July 15, 2014,</em> the
Company publicly announced a plan to repurchase up to
<em data-td-fact-id="30497354" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$3.0</em> million of
its common stock in the open market or in private transactions,
whenever deemed appropriate by management. On
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">January 13, 2015,</em>
the Company announced a plan to purchase up to an additional
<em data-td-fact-id="30497355" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$2,058,000</em> of its
common stock under the repurchase plan, and on
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">May 21, 2015,</em> the
Company announced a further increase to the repurchase plan by
authorizing the purchase of up to an additional
<em data-td-fact-id="30497356" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$2,090,000</em> of its
common stock under the repurchase plan. During <em style=
"font-style: normal;">FY 2017</em><em data-td-invalid-detail="1"
style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">,</em> the
Company repurchased <em data-td-fact-id="30497358" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">35,108</em> shares
under the repurchase plan at an average price of
<em data-td-fact-id="30497359" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$10.01</em> per share.
The Company did <em data-td-fact-id="30497360" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> repurchase any
shares during the <em data-td-fact-id="30497361" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">twelve</em> months
ended <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2018.</em>
As of <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2018,</em>
approximately <em data-td-fact-id="30497362" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$638,000</em> remains
available under the repurchase plan for further stock
repurchases.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div contenteditable="false" docsect="9" id="18019" sectdesc=
"Note to Financial Statements">&nbsp;</div>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-statement-type="note"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553402747" id="thunderdome-statement-883876">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
NOTE <em data-td-fact-id="30497363" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">8</em> - STOCK
COMPENSATION PLANS</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
In FY <em data-td-fact-id="30497364" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2014,</em> stockholders
approved an amendment of the <em data-td-fact-id="30497365" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2007</em> Equity
Incentive Plan (the <em data-td-fact-id="30497366" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">“2007</em> Plan”). The
<em data-td-fact-id="30497367" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2007</em> Plan allows
awards of stock options, stock appreciation rights, stock awards,
restricted stock and stock units, performance shares and
performance units, and other stock- or cash-based awards. The
following table summarizes stock awards under the
<em data-td-fact-id="30497368" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2007</em> Plan as of
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28,
2018:</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-taggable-table="table"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553402743" id="thunderdome-statement-883877">
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="finTable"

Original share authorization:</p>
</td>

&nbsp;</td>
<td id=".symb.2" style=

&nbsp;</td>
<td id=".amt.2" style=

<em data-td-fact-id="30496723" style=

<td id=".trail.2" nowrap="true" style=

&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr style=

<td style=

<p style=

Prior plan shares authorized and incorporated in the 2007 Plan:</p>
</td>
<td id=".lead.2" style=

&nbsp;</td>
<td id=".symb.2" style=

<em data-td-fact-id="30496724" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">85,340</em></td>
<td id=".trail.2" nowrap="true" style=
"width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr style=
"vertical-align: bottom; background-color: rgb(204, 238, 255);">

<div contenteditable="false" docsect="9" id="18020" sectdesc=
"Note to Financial Statements">&nbsp;</div>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-statement-type="note"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553268808" id="thunderdome-statement-883880">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
<br />
NOTE <em data-td-fact-id="30497373" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">9</em> - OPERATING
SEGMENTS</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The Company classifies its business interests into
<em data-td-fact-id="30497374" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">five</em> reportable
segments: Rocky Mountain Chocolate Factory, Inc. Franchising,
Manufacturing, Retail Stores, U-Swirl operations and Other. The
accounting policies of the segments are the same as those described
in the summary of significant accounting policies in Note
<em data-td-fact-id="30497375" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">1</em> to these
consolidated financial statements. The Company evaluates
performance and allocates resources based on operating
contribution, which excludes unallocated corporate general and
administrative costs and income tax expense or benefit. The Company’
s reportable segments are strategic businesses that utilize common
merchandising, distribution, and marketing functions, as well as
common information systems and corporate administration. All
inter-segment sales prices are market based. Each segment is
managed separately because of the differences in required
infrastructure and the differences in products and services:</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-taggable-table="table"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553268802" id="thunderdome-statement-883881">
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="finTable"

FY 2018</p>

<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Revenue from <em data-td-fact-id="30497376" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">one</em> customer of
the Company’s Manufacturing segment represented approximately
<em data-td-fact-id="30497377" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$5.1</em> million, or
<em data-td-fact-id="30497378" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">13.4</em> percent, of
the Company’s revenues from external customers during the year
ended <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2018,</em>
compared to <em data-td-fact-id="30497379" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$4.1</em> million, or
<em data-td-fact-id="30497380" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">10.6</em> percent of
the Company’s revenues from external customers during the year
ended <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28,
2017.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
</div>

<div contenteditable="false" docsect="9" id="18022" sectdesc=
"Note to Financial Statements">&nbsp;</div>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-statement-type="note"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553284716" id="thunderdome-statement-883886">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:left;">
NOTE <em data-td-fact-id="30497384" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">11</em> - EMPLOYEE
BENEFIT PLAN</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The Company has a <em data-td-fact-id="30497385" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">401</em>(k) plan called
the Rocky Mountain Chocolate Factory, Inc. <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497386" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">401</em>(k) Plan.
Eligible participants are permitted to make contributions up to
statutory limits. The Company makes a matching contribution, which
vests ratably over a <em data-td-fact-id="30497387" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">3</em>-year period, and
is <em data-td-fact-id="30497388" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">25%</em> of the
employee’s contribution up to a maximum of <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497389" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">1.5%</em> of the
employee’s compensation. During the years ended
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28</em> or
<em data-td-fact-id="30497390" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">29,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497391" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497392" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2017</em> and
<em data-td-fact-id="30497393" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016,</em> the Company’
s contribution was approximately <em data-td-fact-id="30497394"
style="font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$68,000,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497395" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$66,000,</em> and
<em data-td-fact-id="30497396" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$62,000,</em>
respectively, to the plan.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div contenteditable="false" docsect="9" id="18023" sectdesc=
"Note to Financial Statements">&nbsp;</div>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-statement-type="note"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553294717" id="thunderdome-statement-883887">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
NOTE <em data-td-fact-id="30497397" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">12</em> – SUMMARIZED

<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Following is a summary of the quarterly results of operations for
the fiscal years ended <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2018</em>
and <em data-td-fact-id="30497398" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2017:</em></p>

"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>

"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
Fiscal Quarter</p>

"width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
&nbsp;</td>
<td id=".lead.6" style=
"width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
&nbsp;</td>
<td id=".symb.6" style=
"width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
&nbsp;</td>

"width: 8%; text-align: right; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
<em data-td-fact-id="30497047" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">-</em></td>
<td id=".trail.6" nowrap="true" style=
"width: 1%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt;">
&nbsp;</td>
</tr>
<tr style=
"vertical-align: bottom; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">

<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Effective <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">March 1, 2002,</em>
under ASC Topic <em data-td-fact-id="30497400" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">350,</em> all goodwill
with indefinite lives is <em data-td-fact-id="30497401" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">no</em> longer subject
to amortization. Accumulated amortization related to intangible
assets <em data-td-fact-id="30497402" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> subject to
amortization is a result of amortization expense related to
indefinite life goodwill incurred prior to
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">March 1, 2002.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
On <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497403" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">29,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497404" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016,</em> RMCF
foreclosed on all stock in U-Swirl pledged as collateral on the
SWRL Loan Agreement. As described in Note <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497405" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">1,</em> this was the
result of SWRL’s inability to repay the SWRL Loan Agreement and
inability to cure defaults of financial covenants. As of
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497406" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">29,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497407" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016,</em> U-Swirl had
<em data-td-fact-id="30497408" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$1,930,529</em> of
Goodwill recorded as a result of past business acquisitions. The
Company performed a test of impairment in conjunction with the
change in ownership and the result of the Company’s test indicated
a full impairment of the U-Swirl goodwill. The Company recognized
an impairment loss of <em data-td-fact-id="30497409" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$1,930,529</em> to
reduce the carrying value of Goodwill to the fair value. In making
this determination the Company reviewed the fair value of U-Swirl
compared to its carrying value. In performing this testing, the
Company focused on the actual performance of the acquired
businesses that created the initial recognition of the goodwill, as
well as U-Swirl’s past performance and future expected performance.
Because of the significant underperformance of the acquired
businesses as well as U-Swirl the Company determined that the
carrying value of the reporting unit exceeded its fair value.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The following are events that have indicated that it is more likely
than <em data-td-fact-id="30497410" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> that the fair
value of goodwill is less than the carrying amount:</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style=
"width:100%;font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">&nbsp;</td>
<td style="width:18pt;vertical-align:top;">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;font-size:10pt;">
●</p>
</td>
<td style="vertical-align:top;">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;font-size:10pt;">
SWRL was unable to repay the obligations under the SWRL Loan
Agreement, and as a result, the Company foreclosed on all of the
outstanding stock of U-Swirl International, Inc. as of
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497411" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">29,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497412" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016</em> in full
satisfaction of the amounts owed under the SWRL Loan Agreement.</p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style=
"width:100%;font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">&nbsp;</td>
<td style="width:18pt;vertical-align:top;">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;font-size:10pt;">
●</p>
</td>
<td style="vertical-align:top;">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;font-size:10pt;">
The loan covenant for SWRL required that SWRL maintain adjusted
EBITDA of <em data-td-fact-id="30497413" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$1,804,000</em> and
during the term of the loan SWRL reported trailing
<em data-td-fact-id="30497414" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">twelve</em> month
adjusted EBITDA of between <em data-td-fact-id="30497415" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$1,532,000</em> and
<em data-td-fact-id="30497416" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$1,284,000.</em></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style=
"width:100%;font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">&nbsp;</td>
<td style="width:18pt;vertical-align:top;">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;font-size:10pt;">
●</p>
</td>
<td style="vertical-align:top;">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;font-size:10pt;">
SWRL franchise stores in operation has declined from a peak of
<em data-td-fact-id="30497417" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">287</em> franchise
cafés in operation at <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">August 31, 2014</em> to
<em data-td-fact-id="30497418" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">210</em> franchise
cafés in operation at <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28,
2016.</em></p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style=
"width:100%;font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;">
<tr>
<td style="width:18pt;">&nbsp;</td>
<td style="width:18pt;vertical-align:top;">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;font-size:10pt;">
●</p>
</td>
<td style="vertical-align:top;">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;margin-right:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;font-size:10pt;">
During the <em data-td-fact-id="30497419" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">three</em> and
<em data-td-fact-id="30497420" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">six</em> months ended
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">August 31, 2015,</em>
SWRL disclosed in its separate financial statements that there was
substantial doubt about its ability to continue as a going
concern.</p>
</td>
</tr>
</table>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Amortization expense related to intangible assets totaled
<em data-td-fact-id="30497421" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$446,050,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497422" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$427,840,</em> and
<em data-td-fact-id="30497423" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$378,373</em> during
the fiscal years ended <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28</em> or
<em data-td-fact-id="30497424" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">29,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497425" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497426" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2017</em> and
<em data-td-fact-id="30497427" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016,</em>
respectively.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<div data-thunderdome-xbrl-exclude="1" id="PGBK" style=
"width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
<div id="PGNUM" style=
"text-align: center; width: 100%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
52</div>

"PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; border: none; width: 100%; height: 2px; color: #000000; background-color: #000000" />

<div id="PGHDR" style="text-align: left; width: 100%"><a href=
"#toc">Table of Contents</a></div>
</div>
<p style=
"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
At <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2018,</em>
annual amortization of intangible assets, based upon the Company’s
existing intangible assets and current useful lives, is estimated
to be the following:</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-taggable-table="table"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553315178" id="thunderdome-statement-883892">
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="finTable"
style=
"margin-right: 20%; margin-left: 81pt; width: 80%; font-size: 10pt; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; text-indent: 0px;">
<tr style=
"vertical-align: bottom; background-color: rgb(204, 238, 255);">
<td style=
"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; width: 81%;">
<p style=

"Note to Financial Statements">&nbsp;</div>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-statement-type="note"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553326107" id="thunderdome-statement-883893">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
NOTE <em data-td-fact-id="30497428" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">14</em> – IMPAIRMENT OF
LONG-LIVED RETAIL ASSETS AND RESTRUCTURING CHARGES</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Restructuring and acquisition charges consisted of lease settlement
costs of <em data-td-fact-id="30497429" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$60,000</em> during FY
<em data-td-fact-id="30497430" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2017</em> and
impairment of Leasehold improvements, property and equipment
impairment of long-lived assets and goodwill of
<em data-td-fact-id="30497431" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$2,326,742</em> during
FY <em data-td-fact-id="30497432" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2016.</em> There were
<em data-td-fact-id="30497433" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">no</em> impairment or
restructuring charges incurred during FY <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497434" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div contenteditable="false" docsect="9" id="18026" sectdesc=
"Note to Financial Statements">&nbsp;</div>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-statement-type="note"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553334595" id="thunderdome-statement-883894">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
NOTE <em data-td-fact-id="30497435" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">15</em> – SUBSEQUENT
EVENTS</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
On <em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">May 10,</em>
<em data-td-fact-id="30497436" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2018,</em> the Company
announced that its Board of Directors has declared a
<em data-td-fact-id="30497437" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">first</em> quarter
<em data-td-fact-id="30497438" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">FY2019</em> cash
dividend of <em data-td-fact-id="30497439" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$0.12</em> per common
share outstanding. The cash dividend will be payable
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">June 15, 2018</em> to
shareholders of record at the close of business
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">June 5, 2018.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div contenteditable="false" docsect="9" id="18027" sectdesc=
"Note to Financial Statements">&nbsp;</div>
<div data-td-parse-id="1" data-td-statement-type="note"
data-td-v2v-id="1525553343075" id="thunderdome-statement-883895">
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
NOTE <em data-td-fact-id="30497440" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">16</em> – IMMATERIAL
REVISION OF PREVIOUSLY REPORTED INCOME TAXES AND DEFERRED TAX
LIABILITIES</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
In the <em data-td-fact-id="30497441" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">fourth</em> quarter of
FY <em data-td-fact-id="30497442" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">2017,</em> the Company
identified an immaterial error related to the overstatement of the
income tax benefit and related deferred income tax asset accounts
that impacted the Company’s previously issued annual consolidated
financial statements. The adjustment relates to the foreclosure
upon the interest in U-Swirl and the realization of U-Swirl
deferred tax assets and refundable income taxes.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The Company determined that this error was <em data-td-fact-id=
"30497443" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> material to
any of the Company’s prior annual consolidated financial statements
and therefore, amendments of previously filed reports were
<em data-td-fact-id="30497444" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">not</em> required. As
such, a revision for the correction is reflected in the
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28, 2017</em>
financial information of the applicable prior periods in this Form
<em data-td-fact-id="30497445" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">10</em>-K. The error
resulted in corrections to beginning retained earnings, accrued
liabilities and deferred tax assets of $(<em data-td-fact-id=
"30497446" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">492,766</em>),
<em data-td-fact-id="30497447" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">$192,233</em> and
$(<em data-td-fact-id="30497448" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">300,533</em>),
respectively, on the Consolidated Balance Sheet as of
<em data-td-invalid-detail="1" style=
"font-weight: inherit; font-style: normal;">February 28,
2017.</em></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<div data-thunderdome-xbrl-exclude="1" id="PGBK" style=
"width: 100%; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt">
<div id="PGNUM" style=
"text-align: center; width: 100%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">

<div contenteditable="false" docsect="12" id="18028" sectdesc=
"Other">&nbsp;</div>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b><a id="i9" name="i9"></a>ITEM 9. CHANGES IN AND DISAGREEMENTS
WITH ACCOUNTANTS ON ACCOUNTING AND FINANCIAL DISCLOSURE</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
None.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b><a id="i9a" name="i9a"></a>ITEM 9A. CONTROLS AND
PROCEDURES</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b>Disclosure Controls and Procedures and Changes in Internal
Control Over Financial Reporting</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
<i>Limitations on Controls and Procedures</i> — Because of their
inherent limitations, disclosure controls and procedures and
internal control over financial reporting (collectively, “Control
Systems”) may not prevent or detect all failures or misstatements
of the type sought to be avoided by Control Systems. Also,
projections of any evaluation of the effectiveness of the Company’s
Control Systems to future periods are subject to the risk that such
controls may become inadequate because of changes in conditions, or
that the degree of compliance with the policies or procedures may
deteriorate. Management, including the Company’s Chief Executive
Officer (the “CEO”) and Chief Financial Officer (the “CFO”), does
not expect that the Company’s Control Systems will prevent all
errors or all fraud. A Control System, no matter how well conceived
and operated, can provide only reasonable, not absolute, assurance
that the objectives of the Control System are met. Further, the
design of a Control System must reflect the fact that there are
resource constraints, and the benefits of controls must be
considered relative to their costs. Because of the inherent
limitations in all Control Systems, no evaluation can provide
absolute assurance that all control issues and instances of fraud,
if any, within the Company have been detected. These reports by
management, including the CEO and CFO, on the effectiveness of the
Company’s Control Systems express only reasonable assurance of the
conclusions reached.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
<i>Disclosure Controls and Procedures</i> — The Company maintains
disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Rules 13a-15(e)
and 15d-15(e) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended
(the “Exchange Act”)), that are designed to ensure that material
information relating to the Company is made known to the officers
who certify the Company’s financial reports and to other members of
senior management and the Board of Directors. These disclosure
controls and procedures are designed to ensure that information
required to be disclosed in the Company’s reports that are filed or
submitted under the Exchange Act, are recorded, processed,
summarized, and reported within the time periods specified in the
SEC’s rules and forms. Disclosure controls and procedures include,
without limitation, controls and procedures designed to ensure that
information required to be disclosed by an issuer in the reports
that it files or submits under the Exchange Act is accumulated and
communicated to our management, including our principal executive
and principal financial officers, or persons performing similar
functions, as appropriate to allow timely decisions regarding
required disclosure.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Management, with the participation of the CEO and CFO, has
evaluated the effectiveness, as of February 28, 2018, of the
Company’s disclosure controls and procedures. Based on that
evaluation, the CEO and CFO have concluded that the Company’s
disclosure controls and procedures were effective as of February
28, 2018.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
<i>Management’s Annual Report on Internal Control over Financial
Reporting</i> — Management is responsible for establishing and
maintaining adequate internal control over financial reporting (as
defined in Rule 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f) under the Exchange Act).
The Company’s internal control over financial reporting is a
process designed under supervision of the Company’s principal
executive officer and principal financial officer to provide
reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial
reporting and preparation of the Company’s consolidated financial
statements for external purposes in accordance with generally
accepted accounting principles. Management, with the participation
of the CEO and CFO, has evaluated the effectiveness, as of February
28, 2018, of the Company’s internal control over financial
reporting. In making this evaluation, management used the criteria
set forth by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the
Treadway Commission in its publication Internal Control-Integrated
Framework (2013). Based on that evaluation, management has
concluded that the Company’s internal control over financial
reporting was effective as of February 28, 2018.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
<i>Changes in Internal Control over Financial Reporting</i> —There
were no changes in the Company’s internal control over financial
reporting that occurred during the quarter ended February 28, 2018
that have materially affected, or are reasonably likely to
materially affect, the Company’s internal control over financial
reporting.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b><a id="i9b" name="i9b"></a>ITEM 9B. OTHER INFORMATION</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
None.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<div data-thunderdome-xbrl-exclude="1" id="PGBK" style=

<div id="PGNUM" style=
"text-align: center; width: 100%; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">
54</div>

<p style=
"font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt; margin: 0pt; text-align: left">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b><a id="p3" name="p3"></a>PART III.</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b>&nbsp;</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b><a id="i10" name="i10"></a>ITEM 10. DIRECTORS, EXECUTIVE
OFFICERS AND CORPORATE GOVERNANCE</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The information required by this item is incorporated herein by
reference from our Definitive Proxy Statement for our 2018 Annual
Meeting of Stockholders, to be filed no later than 120 days after
February 28, 2018.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b><a id="i11" name="i11"></a>ITEM 11. EXECUTIVE
COMPENSATION</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
<b>&nbsp;</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The information required by this item is incorporated herein by
reference from our Definitive Proxy Statement for our 2018 Annual
Meeting of Stockholders, to be filed no later than 120 days after
February 28, 2018.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b><a id="i12" name="i12"></a>ITEM 12. SECURITY OWNERSHIP OF
CERTAIN BENEFICIAL OWNERS AND MANAGEMENT AND RELATED STOCKHOLDER

<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
Except for the information below, the information required by this
item is incorporated herein by reference from our Definitive Proxy
Statement for our 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, to be filed
no later than 120 days after February 28, 2018.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>

<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
(1) Awards outstanding under the 2007 Equity Incentive Plan as of
February 28, 2018 consist of 77,594 unvested restricted stock
units. The weighted-average exercise price is calculated solely
with respect to the outstanding stock
options.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
(2) Represents shares remaining available under the Company’s 2007
Equity Incentive Plan. Shares available for future issuances under
the 2007 Equity Incentive Plan may be issued in the form of stock
options, stock appreciation rights, restricted stock and stock
units, performance shares and performance units, and other stock-
and cash-based awards.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
<b><a id="i13" name="i13"></a>ITEM 13. CERTAIN RELATIONSHIPS AND
RELATED TRANSACTIONS, AND DIRECTOR INDEPENDENCE</b></p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
The information required by this item is incorporated herein by
reference from our Definitive Proxy Statement for our 2018 Annual
Meeting of Stockholders, to be filed no later than 120 days after
February 28, 2018.</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:justify;">
&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">

AND SERVICES</b></p>

"font-family:'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:10pt;margin:0pt;text-align:center;">
&nbsp;</p>

reference from our Definitive Proxy Statement for our 2018 Annual

<p style=

&nbsp;</p>
<p style=
